title: Nine new Covid-19 deaths confirmed in Sri Lanka
body_lines: The Director-General of Health Services has confirmed another 09 coronavirus-related deaths for March 11, pushing the country’s Covid-19 death toll to 16,390.
This figure includes 07 males and 02 females, according to the Department of Government Information.
One of the deceased patients is between the ages 30-59 years and the remaining 08 are in the age group of 60 years and above.
